query:
-- Get the organization ID (assuming there's only one org for now)
WITH org AS (
  SELECT id FROM organizations LIMIT 1
)
INSERT INTO job_statuses (org_id, name, color, display_order, category, is_default)
SELECT 
  org.id,
  status_data.name,
  status_data.color,
  status_data.display_order,
  status_data.category,
  status_data.is_default
FROM org, (VALUES
  ('Pending', '#f59e0b', 1, 'pending', true),
  ('Ready', '#3b82f6', 2, 'pending', false),
  ('In Progress', '#8b5cf6', 3, 'active', false),
  ('Completed', '#10b981', 4, 'completed', false),
  ('Cancelled', '#ef4444', 5, 'completed', false)
) AS status_data(name, color, display_order, category, is_default)
ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
RETURNING *;
